text: KNCP-LP (107.3 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of La Pine, Oregon. The station is owned by Lapine Frontier Days Association and airs a variety format. The station was assigned the call sign KITG-LP by the Federal Communications Commission on February 7, 2014. The station changed its call sign to KNCP-LP on March 6, 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * NCP-LP NCP-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Oregon Category:Variety radio stations in the United States Category:Deschutes County, Oregon
title: KNCP-LP
